name: Project Snowball
description:
NOTE: this is a prototype. The initial game concept was 3D, but was thrown away simplified because of an engine bug. Even then, some time was lost on making models and shaders.

Make a snowman with a stranger!

A person you meet during a walk invites you to build a snowman.

Controls: use the space bar to push the snowballs. You can use this to make them smaller or control the place where they land.
